name: Screenshots Pro
description: A powerful, online screenshot generator to create beautiful app previews for the App Store and Google Play.
introduction:
## Tool Introduction
Screenshots Pro is a game-changing online tool that simplifies the process of creating stunning screenshot mockups for your iOS and Android apps. With its user-friendly editor, you can effortlessly frame your app screenshots into the latest device models, apply various effects, and localize content for different regions - all within a matter of minutes.

## Key Features
- Massive library of device frames (23+ Apple and Android models)
- Supports portrait and landscape orientations
- 3D perspective mockups for a premium look
- Localization to translate screenshots into multiple languages
- Auto-resizing for required App Store and Play Store sizes

## Ideal Use Cases
- Developers and designers creating app listing pages
- Startups preparing app marketing materials
- Agencies designing assets for client app launches
- Individual app creators polishing their product visuals

## Getting Started
1. Browse the pre-made templates or start from scratch
2. Upload your app screenshots and frame them on desired devices
3. Customize colors, angles, languages, etc. using the intuitive editor
4. Download high-res exports optimized for app stores

## User Advice
- Utilize the 3D angles to give screenshots a modern, premium feel
- Take advantage of localization to expand to international markets
- For bulk requirements, consider the Extended plan with API access
